short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks life-status for actors and musicians on Wikipedia movie and/or album pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Their Name Is Alive" is a Chrome Extension that scans the Cast or Personnel section on Wikipedia movie or album pages. It checks whether individuals listed are alive or deceased using Wikipedia’s content and marks them with ✅ (alive) or ❌ (deceased).
